summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing grant of an easement for road purposes to Burlington Northern Inc. across City land in the southeast 1/4 of the northwest 1/4 of the southeast 1/4 of Section 23, Township 21 North, Range 9 East, W.M., and authorizing the acceptance as consideration therefor of an easement for road purposes across Burlington Northern Inc. land in the northwest 1/4 of the northeast 1/4 of the southeast quarter of Section 23, Township 21 North, Range 9 East, W.M.
